column2: BRIEF-Timken Co Says CEO's 2019 Total Compensation Was $11.9 Million March 17 (Reuters) - Timken Co: * TIMKEN CO SAYS CEO RICHARD KYLE’S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $11.9 MILLION VERSUS $8.7 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * TIMKEN CO SAYS FOR 2019, CEO PAY RATIO WAS 229 TO 1 Source text: (bit.ly/3d71zH3) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Timken Increases Dividend May 8 (Reuters) - Timken Co: * 4 PERCENT INCREASE TO COMPANY’S QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND, RAISING IT TO 28 CENTS PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Timken Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.01 Excluding Items May 1 (Reuters) - Timken Co: * TIMKEN REPORTS STRONG FIRST-QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; RAISES FULL-YEAR OUTLOOK * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.59 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.84, REVENUE VIEW $836.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * COMPANY NOW EXPECTS 2018 REVENUE TO BE UP APPROXIMATELY 17 PERCENT IN TOTAL VERSUS 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
